DOC.brief_summary: To assess strut coverage patient present acute myocardial infarction treat either SYNERGY stent Bioresorbable Vascular Scaffold , parallel group design .
DOC.brief_title: Strut Coverage With SYNERGY Stents Bioresorbable Vascular Scaffold Acute Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: Single center , simple-blind randomize controlled trial , compare SYNERGY stent BVS device parallel group design .
DOC.criteria: Acute coronary syndrome STelevation , One culprit lesion eligible percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) stent implantation , Reference vessel measure 2.5 mm 3.75 mm per visual estimation , without extreme vessel tortuosity , thrombolysis myocardial infarction ( TIMI ) 3 flow stent deployment target vessel , Patient least 1 lesion eligible plan PCI next culprit lesion , Patient affiliate French national health care system , Patient agree participate full information study ( signature inform consent ) .
